title: The Rise and Fall of the World's Largest Gay Dating App
full_text: The Rise and Fall of the World's Largest Gay Dating App. The new book The Wall Dancers explores the uneasy relationship between Chinese internet users and a government that is always watching.. Not only did Ma land an official partnership with Beijings CDC, the agency later invited him to the 2012 conference where he unexpectedly connected with Li and told the political leader to his face t… [+3019 chars]
